text: Smarana karaa, yetiya allahe ka’le, ‘he icha! Niscaya ma'i tomaka paraigrahana karaima, arau tomaka mora ocaralai utha'i anima arau yisakale kupharai karae sihamtara paraa tomaka paraitra karaima arau tomara anusaraisakalaka kiyamata paryanta kaphirasakalara oparata praadhan'ya dima, tara pichata mora ocarate'i tomalokara pratyarartana’. Tomalokara majata yi bisaye matanaikya haiche ma'i tomalokara majata tara mimansa karai dima
